00040 /*============================================================================*/
00041 /* Public data definitions.                                                   */
00042 /*============================================================================*/
00043 
00044 lnp_key_entry_t lnp_key_store[KEY_TABLE_SIZE];
00045 
00046 /*============================================================================*/
00047 /* Private data definitions.                                                  */
00048 /*============================================================================*/
00049 
00050 /*
00051  *
00052  */
00053 static u_int first_free_slot = 0;
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * 
00057  */
00058 static pthread_mutex_t lnp_key_store_mutex;
00059 
00060 /*============================================================================*/
00061 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00062 /*============================================================================*/           
00063 
00064 int lnp_key_store_initialize() {
00065         int i;
00066         
00067         if (pthread_mutex_init(&lnp_key_store_mutex, NULL)) {
00068                 return LNP_ERROR;
00069         }
00070 
00071         pthread_mutex_lock(&lnp_key_store_mutex);
00072         for (i=0; i<KEY_TABLE_SIZE-1; i++) {
00073                 lnp_key_store[i].next_free_slot = i+1;
00074                 /*if (pthread_mutex_init(&lnp_key_store[i].handshake_mutex, NULL) ||
00075                                 pthread_cond_init(&lnp_key_store[i].handshake_condition, NULL)){
00076                         pthread_mutex_unlock(&lnp_key_store_mutex);
00077                         return LNP_ERROR;
00078                 }*/
00079         }
00080         lnp_key_store[i].next_free_slot = NULL_SLOT;
00081         first_free_slot = 0;
00082         pthread_mutex_unlock(&lnp_key_store_mutex);
00083         
00084         return LNP_OK;
00085 }
00086 /******************************************************************************/
00087 void lnp_key_store_finalize() {
00088         /*int i;
00089         
00090         for (i=0; i<KEY_TABLE_SIZE-1; i++) {
00091                 pthread_mutex_destroy(&lnp_key_store[i].handshake_mutex);
00092                 pthread_cond_destroy(&lnp_key_store[i].handshake_condition);
00093         }*/
00094 
00095         pthread_mutex_destroy(&lnp_key_store_mutex);    
00096 }
00097 /******************************************************************************/
00098 int lnp_key_store_new() {
00099         int result;
00100 
00101         pthread_mutex_lock(&lnp_key_store_mutex);
00102         result = first_free_slot;
00103         if (result == NULL_SLOT) {
00104                 result = NULL_SLOT;     
00105         } else {
00106                 first_free_slot = lnp_key_store[result].next_free_slot;
00107                 lnp_key_store[result].next_free_slot = USED_SLOT;
00108         }
00109         pthread_mutex_unlock(&lnp_key_store_mutex);
00110         
00111         return result;
00112 }
00113 /******************************************************************************/
00114 void lnp_key_store_delete(int key_entry_index) {
00115         pthread_mutex_lock(&lnp_key_store_mutex);
00116         if (lnp_key_store[key_entry_index].next_free_slot == USED_SLOT) {
00117                 lnp_key_store[key_entry_index].next_free_slot = first_free_slot;
00118                 first_free_slot = key_entry_index;
00119         }
00120         pthread_mutex_unlock(&lnp_key_store_mutex);
00121 }
00122 /******************************************************************************/
00123 int lnp_set_cipher_in_key(int index, u_char *key) {
00124 
00125         /* Freeing possible existant key. */
00126         if (lnp_key_store[index].cipher_in_key != NULL) {
00127                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET,
00128                                 "cipher_in_key already exists, freeing.");
00129                 free(lnp_key_store[index].cipher_in_key);
00130                 lnp_key_store[index].cipher_in_key = NULL;
00131         }
00132         
00133         /* Checking if a cipher is assigned to this entry. */
00134         if (lnp_key_store[index].cipher == NULL) {
00135                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET,
00136                                 "no cipher found for this key store entry.");
00137                 return LNP_ERROR;
00138         }
00139         
00140         /* Creating a new key. */
00141         lnp_key_store[index].cipher_in_key =
00142                         (u_char *)malloc(lnp_key_store[index].cipher->key_length);
00143         if (lnp_key_store[index].cipher_in_key == NULL) {
00144                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_NET, "error in malloc: %s.",
00145                                 strerror(errno));
00146                 return LNP_ERROR;
00147         }
00148         memcpy(lnp_key_store[index].cipher_in_key, key,
00149                         lnp_key_store[index].cipher->key_length);
00150         
00151         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "new decryption key set.");
00152         
00153         return LNP_OK;
00154 }
00155 /******************************************************************************/
00156 int lnp_set_cipher_in_iv(int index, u_char *iv) {
00157

00166         /* Checking if a cipher is assigned to this key store entry. */

00169                                 "no cipher found for this key store entry.");
00170                 return LNP_ERROR;

00255 int lnp_set_mac_in_key(int index, u_char *key) {
00256         
00257         /* Freeing possible existant key. */

00263         }
00264         
00265         /* Checking if a MAC function is assigned to this key store entry. */

00267                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET,
00268                                 "no MAC function found for this key store entry.");
00269                 return LNP_ERROR;
00270         }

00272         /* Creating a new mac key. */

00281                         lnp_key_store[index].mac->key_length);
00282         
00283         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "new MAC verification key set.");

00285         return LNP_OK;
